Introduction

FLASHE (Korean: 플래쉬; Japanese: フラッシュ; also stylized as FlaShe) was a four-member girl group under Play Music Entertainment (a subsidiary under FLASHE Ent.). They originally debuted as five in July 2012 with the single "Drop It Pop It".
On January 31, 2020 the group posted on their Daum Café that they would be disbanding on February 1.
